original_title: Kiss [2004] VH1 When KISS Ruled The World
overview: The costumes. The make-up. The tongue-wagging. The women. Through the personal stories pf the people who were there, when KISS ruled the world will chronicle how KISS – literally – changed the face of music forever. KISS concerts became the standard to meet for all future bands. VH1’s one hour program will chronicle KISS’ phenomenal rise to fame, the band’s painful 15 years separation, and the group’s extraordinary influence.
title: Kiss [2004] VH1 When KISS Ruled The World
